Description: Low conical foot sherd (mended from four fragments) of Chian, possibly Wild Goat Style or early patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; exterior: glazed streaky black; inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: The low conical foot suggests that the foot belonged to an early chalice.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 33)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 645, no. 28)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0303) (phase 2)
